2.0.0-alpha.name: web3-core
2.0.0-alpha.description: Web3 core tools for sub packages. This is an internal package.
2.0.0-alpha.readme:
# web3-core

This is a sub module of [web3.js][repo]

The ```web3-core``` contains the AbstractWeb3Module. 
This should be used if someone wants to implement a new web3 module. 

## Installation

```bash
npm install web3-core
```

## Usage

```js
import {AbstractWeb3Module} from 'web3-core';

new AbstractWeb3Module(...);
```

## Types 

All the typescript typings are placed in the types folder. 

[docs]: http://web3js.readthedocs.io/en/1.0/
[repo]: https://github.com/ethereum/web3.js

2.0.0-alpha.1.name: web3-core
2.0.0-alpha.1.description: Web3 core tools for sub packages. This is an internal package.
2.0.0-alpha.1.readme:
# web3-core

This is a sub module of [web3.js][repo]

The ```web3-core``` contains the AbstractWeb3Module. 
This should be used if someone wants to implement a new web3 module. 

## Installation

```bash
npm install web3-core
```

## Usage

```js
import {AbstractWeb3Module} from 'web3-core';

new AbstractWeb3Module(...);
```

## Types 

All the typescript typings are placed in the types folder. 

[docs]: http://web3js.readthedocs.io/en/1.0/
[repo]: https://github.com/ethereum/web3.js
